Simple Horizontal Noob Slider using Mootools 1.3.

    Parameters
  • Source: javascript data files
    javascript sample can be found in /media/user/js
  • jsvar: variable name from javascript above.
    You can load only one javascript for many photo slider.
  • path: Your image path realtive to /media/user/images
  • size: default value for image width is 104px;
